urn:resource_type.urn:documentation: This resource allows for manage compute instances, e.g. creating virtual machines.

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.architecture
attributeClassification.description: CPU Architecture of the instance: Enum{x86,x64}

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.cores
attributeClassification.description: Number of virtual CPU cores assigned to the instance

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.hostname
attributeClassification.description: Fully qualified DNS host name for the instance

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.share
attributeClassification.description: Relative number of CPU shares for the instance

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.memory
attributeClassification.description: Minimum RAM in gigabytes allocated to the instance

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.state
attributeClassification.description: Current state of the instance: Enum{active, inactive, suspended, error}

attributeClassification.name: occi.compute.state.message
attributeClassification.description: Human-readable explanation of the current instance state

attributeClassification.name: openstack.compute.name
attributeClassification.description: The name of the virtual machine.

attributeClassification.name: openstack.compute.keyname
attributeClassification.description: The name of the key to access the virtual machine.

attributeClassification.name: openstack.image.name
attributeClassification.description: The name of the image.

attributeClassification.name: openstack.image.mindisk
attributeClassification.description: Minimum disk space required for this image.

attributeClassification.name: openstack.image.minram
attributeClassification.description: Minimum memory required for this image.

attributeClassification.name: occi.networkinterface.address
attributeClassification.description: Internet Protocol(IP) network address (e.g. 192.168.0.1/24, fc00::/7) of the link

attributeClassification.name: occi.networkinterface.gateway
attributeClassification.description: Internet Protocol(IP) network address (e.g. 192.168.0.1/24, fc00::/7)

attributeClassification.name: occi.networkinterface.allocation
attributeClassification.description: Address mechanism: dynamic e.g. usesthe dynamic host configuration protocol,static e.g. uses user supplied static network configurations.

attributeClassification.name: occi.storagelink.deviceid
attributeClassification.description: Device identifier as defined by the OCCI service provider.

attributeClassification.name: occi.storagelink.mountpoint
attributeClassification.description: Point to where the storage is mounted in the guest OS.

attributeClassification.name: occi.storagelink.state
attributeClassification.description: Current status of the instance.

attributeClassification.name: occi.storagelink.state.message
attributeClassification.description: Human-readable explanation of the current instance state.

attributeClassification.name: occi.networkinterface.interface
attributeClassification.description: Identifier that relates the link to the linkâ€™s device interface

attributeClassification.name: occi.networkinterface.mac
attributeClassification.description: MAC address associated with the link's device interface

attributeClassification.description: Current state of the instance: Enum{active, inactive, error}

attributeClassification.name: occi.networkinterface.message
attributeClassification.description: Human-readable explanation of the current instance state
